    • About Tina Caul


    With over 18 years of experience selling homes, Tina Caul has a knowledge of the housing market that is unmatched. By applying aggressive marketing and sales skills to get property “SOLD” for the highest price in the shortest period of time, she has consistently ranked as the #1 selling agent and currently ranks in the top 1% of Realtors® nationwide. Her most proud accomplishment as an agent is that over 65% of her business comes from client referrals and repeat customers. As the Team Leader of The Caul Real Estate Group, Tina is committed to making you a client for life!
